resources.string:
Open BART is a lean, mean, free and open-source transit companion! Check out the "About" screen in the settings menu (or the info icon in Android 3.0+) to contact us.

May you always avoid the smelly trains!

Check out our code on github!

string-array.name: aboutDialog
string-array.item:
Open BART is open source software, so it belongs to all of us. Check out the code on github.

Thanks to thebuzzmedia\'s super-fast xml parser!

When you find a bug or need a feature drop us a line at davidpbrodsky@gmail.com.

Let\'s make this thing better!

resources.string: I\'ll vibrate when you need to move

I can vibrate your phone when your stops are approaching! You can also check the notification bar at any time to see your next move.

This is an experimental feature.
